mapper.sql: ID_PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN AS profileTableColumnId , PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN_NAME AS profileTableColumnName , ID_PROFILE_TABLE AS profileTableId , PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN_DESC AS profileTableColumnDesc , PROFILE_TABLE_COLUMN_ORDER AS profileTableColumnOrder , CREATE_USER AS createUser , UPDATE_USER AS updateUser , UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , DEL_FLAG AS delFlag
